directions: Combine tomatoes, cucumbers, red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, orange bell peppers, mangoes and avocados in a large bowl. Add balsamic vinegar and Greek seasoning. Stir salad gently. Set aside for 10 minutes.
Arrange lettuce leaves onto a platter to make a bed of lettuce. Spoon salad mixture onto lettuce.
ingredients: 2 red bell peppers, cut into cubes
2 yellow bell peppers, cut into cubes
2 orange bell peppers, cut into cubes
1 cup balsamic vinegar, or to taste
1/4 cup Greek seasoning, or to taste
title: Greek Mango Salad
